top.parak.kraft.core.log.statemachine

接口 StateMachine

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractDirectStateMachine, AbstractSingleThreadStateMachine, EmptyStateMachine

    public interface StateMachine
    State machine.
    从以下版本开始:
    2022-03-18
    作者:
    KHighness

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void applyLog(StateMachineContext context, int index, byte[] commandBytes, int firstLogIndex)
      Apply the log entry to the state machine.
      void applySnapshot(Snapshot snapshot)
      Apply the snapshot to the state machine
      void generateSnapshot(OutputStream output)
      Generate snapshot of state machine into the output stream.
      int getLastApplied()
      Get the index of the last applied log.
      boolean shouldGenerateSnapshot(int firstLogIndex, int lastApplied)
      Return whether the state machine should generate snapshot or not.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown the state machine.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getLastApplied

        int getLastApplied()
        Get the index of the last applied log.
        返回:
        the index of the last applied log

      • applyLog

        void applyLog(StateMachineContext context,
              int index,
              @Nonnull
              byte[] commandBytes,
              int firstLogIndex)
        Apply the log entry to the state machine.
        参数:
        context - the context of the state machine
        index - the index of the log entry to be applied
        commandBytes - the bytes of the command
        firstLogIndex - the index of the first applied log

      • shouldGenerateSnapshot

        boolean shouldGenerateSnapshot(int firstLogIndex,
                               int lastApplied)
        Return whether the state machine should generate snapshot or not.

        Generate snapshot when existing log entries exceed a certain threshold.

        参数:
        firstLogIndex - the index of the first applied log, may not be 0
        lastApplied - the index of the last applied log
        返回:
        true if the state machine should generate snapshot, otherwise false

      • generateSnapshot

        void generateSnapshot(@Nonnull
                      OutputStream output)
               throws IOException
        Generate snapshot of state machine into the output stream.
        参数:
        output - the output stream
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO exception occurs

      • applySnapshot

        void applySnapshot(@Nonnull
                   Snapshot snapshot)
            throws IOException
        Apply the snapshot to the state machine
        参数:
        snapshot - the snapshot
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO exception occurs

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown the state machine.
